sys_script.name: NeedIt When needed field state

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="fbe2ee26dbfc20102e98dde74896191c" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>NeedIt When needed field state</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var rightNow=new GlideDateTime();
	var todayDate=rightNow.getDate();
	var whenNeeded=new GlideDateTime(current.u_when_needed);
	var whenNeededDate=whenNeeded.getDate();
	if(whenNeededDate.onOrBefore(todayDate) || whenNeeded.before(rightNow)){
		gs.addErrorMessage("When needed date cannot be in the past.  Your request has not been saved to the database.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-23 19:40:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>fbe2ee26dbfc20102e98dde74896191c</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e99f4ec52f1d6010ad6059a72799b6b6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIt When needed field state</sys_name><sys_overrides display_value="">762771852f1d6010ad6059a72799b661</sys_overrides><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e99f4ec52f1d6010ad6059a72799b6b6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>thomas.rogienski</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-23 19:40:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e99f4ec52f1d6010ad6059a72799b6b6"/></record_update>
